Class com.chimu.form.database.support.TableRowGeneratorClass 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----com.chimu.kernel.streams.GeneratorAbsClass
           |
           +----com.chimu.form.database.support.TableRowGeneratorClass
public class TableRowGeneratorClass
extends GeneratorAbsClass
implements GeneratorFromDatabase
TableRowGeneratorClass implements one type of DatabaseGenerator: that which uses a single row in a table to store counter values.

Variable Index

- canCommitConnection
- columnToValueFunction
- counterColumn
- currentValue
- distinguishingValue
- limitValue
- limitValueFunction
- needToFetchPredicate
- nextValueFunction
- shouldWriteBack
Should the limitValue be writen back to the database after fetching the currentValue? True indicates this is under client control, which would be appropriate for databases without SP.
- startingValue
- table
- valueToColumnFunction
